Barcelona, Spain | Oct. 31 - Nov. 1
Dream it. Hack it. Ship it.

Sponsor
24h to create the stuff you have always dreamed of but never dared to try. Kairos Hacks is about making the crazy ideas come true, join over 400 of the brightest hackers and innovators in the world for an amazing weekend of creativity, learning and technology.
Last year we organised the first student hackathon in Spain. Over 190 hackers right before the Mobile World Congress for an unforgettable weekend. We can’t wait to see you soon in Barcelona!

Frequently Asked Questions
What is a hackathon?
Hackathons are where thoughts become things, collaborating, coding and creating literally anything. Attendees work in teams of up to four people for twenty-four hours to create a hack, web, app, hardware or anything.
What if I don't have a team?
You need not to worry! Part of the fun of a hackathon is meeting new people. We will have time at the beginning of the event for everyone to meet and form teams. Everyone from first time hackers to 1337 h4x0rs will find their perfect match.
When is Kairos Hacks?
Kairos Hacks will start the morning of Saturday, October 31st and continue through November 1st.
Where is it being held?
Kairos Hacks will take place in sunny Barcelona, Spain.
What can I build?
Web, mobile, hardware, anything is on the table. Projects will be judged based on creativity, technical difficulty, polish, and usefulness by a panel of industry judges.
How much does it cost?
Kairos Hacks is free for all accepted hackers. We will provide your WiFi, meals, swag, and workspace. We also have a limited number of travel scholarships available. (Up to 100€ if you're traveling from outside of Spain and 200€ if you're joining us from outside of Europe).
What should I bring?
All attendees must bring a valid ID for admission. Other common checklist items include: laptops, sleeping bags, chargers and toiletries. We strongly recommend comfy shoes for the night :3
How big can teams be?
Teams of up to four are welcome. You can also hack solo if you want!
Do you have a code of conduct?
Yes tl;dr: Be excellent to each other.
What if I have another question?
Tweet us at @karioshacks or drop us a line at khacks@kairossociety.org
Who can attend?
Students from universities and high schools from all around the world.

About the Kairos Society
The Kairos Society works with young entrepreneurs from idea to execution to solve problems and scale impact.
kairossociety.org
Based in San Francisco, CA
